Sends a message to the administrator email when unauthorized users encounter issues accessing DocSpace.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"required":["email","message"],"type":"object","properties":{"message":{"maxLength":255,"minLength":0,"type":"string","description":"The content of the administrator message to be sent.","nullable":true,"example":"some text"},"email":{"maxLength":255,"minLength":0,"type":"string","description":"Email","format":"email","nullable":true,"example":"Sydney_Roberts4@hotmail.com"},"culture":{"type":"string","description":"Culture","nullable":true,"example":"some text"},"recaptchaType":{"oneOf":[{"enum":["Default","AndroidV2","iOSV2","hCaptcha"],"type":"string","description":"[Default - Default, AndroidV2 - AndroidV2, iOSV2 - iOSV2, hCaptcha - hCaptcha]","example":"Default"},{"enum":[0,1,2,3],"type":"integer","description":"[0 - Default, 1 - AndroidV2, 2 - iOSV2, 3 - hCaptcha]","example":0,"x-enum-varnames":["Default","AndroidV2","iOSV2","hCaptcha"],"x-enum-descriptions":["Default","AndroidV2","iOSV2","hCaptcha"]}],"description":"The type of CAPTCHA validation used.","x-enum-type":"integer","title":"RecaptchaType"},"recaptchaResponse":{"type":"string","description":"The user's response to the CAPTCHA challenge.","nullable":true,"example":"some text"}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The request parameters for configuring the administrator message content.","title":"AdminMessageSettingsRequestsDto"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
